flavor: You experienced a potent visionâ€”a triggered racial memory that showed you images of the Great One, a thri-kreen khan who once ruled your race and worked alongside humans. Do you seek to restore the alliance between your people and other humanoids? Do you delve deeper into thri-kreen history? name: Follower Of The Great One
